name: Untitled Platformer
description:
Play as Barry, the King of Aureon, who now has to save his kingdom from the evil Universal Brotherhood...whom have plans of poisoning the lands with darkness, but all Barry really cares about is his sandwich

This is a Uni Major project, Will be verry thankful that you fill out the survey once played in order to assist in our development.  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSclOByQJKuQGCIZ3wrK3JSX2tHWg4LFg6HgDsPCJLmIcC1T2w/viewform.
